title: Almost Arial, But Not.... (Helvetica) {Jan}
content:
Yet another font close to arial that I’d like an exact match on. The sample includes text of 2 different sizes.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091030164645im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/almost-arial_4666.jpg)
author: Fontophile

comments.content:
Have you considered the _original_ Arial?  
(the ‘o’ seems a bit narrow tho.)

By ’original’ Arial, I presume you mean [Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20091030164645/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/helvetica/) (which is a bit narrower than the Neue version).

- Mike Yanega

I do.

;-)

We’re probably close to the point in time when Helvetica is regarded as the clone of Arial instead of vice versa.
Yep, thanks spacecadet. Helvetica LT light is a perfect match.
